name: Joe Mamba
description: First person/platforming/puzzle experience. Play through 5 (or more *wink*) levels as Joe Mamba, a snake out to prove his ability to cook, serve and a whole host of other... tasks. Find secrets, beat time trials, and most importantly, enjoy yourself! Bon appetit! Joe Mamba is currently in demo form but depending on feedback may become much more of a fleshed out game in near future.
